instructions: 2. Place it in the same directory as your Remotely client
3. The client will automatically use this configuration on startup
4. Ensure the server endpoint is accessible from the client machine
description: Example configuration for AI Exam Taker auto-connect setup
notes: Replace 'serverEndpoint' with your actual Remotely server address
Replace 'deviceId' with the ID of the target exam computer
Replace 'accessKey' with your actual API access key
Set 'autoConnect' to true for automatic connection on startup
Adjust timeout and retry settings as needed for your network
